properties.name: uvs
properties.description: The UVs of the mesh. If not provided, they will be filled with 0 and match the size of the positions.

properties.name: shrinkBuffersToFit
properties.description: Whether to shrink the buffers to fit the data.

properties.name: data
properties.type:
positions,
            label: 'attribute-mesh-positions',
            shrinkToFit,
            usage: BufferUsage.VERTEX | BufferUsage.COPY_DST,
        })

properties.name: data
properties.type:
uvs,
            label: 'attribute-mesh-uvs',
            shrinkToFit,
            usage: BufferUsage.VERTEX | BufferUsage.COPY_DST,
        })

properties.name: data
properties.type:
indices,
            label: 'index-mesh-buffer',
            shrinkToFit,
            usage: BufferUsage.INDEX | BufferUsage.COPY_DST,
        })

properties.name: attributes
